title: Verify Port Access Credentials
description: A security guard at a gate needs to verify the identity of a person requesting entry.

tasks.description: Request the person's port access card or Transportation Worker Identification Credential (TWIC).
tasks.expected_outcome: Guard receives the person's ID card.

tasks.description: Scan the card or manually enter the ID number into the access control system.
Verify that the system shows the card is valid and the photo matches the person, then grant access.
tasks.expected_outcome: Guard confirms the card is valid, the photo matches, and allows the person to enter.
